pages.text: Medic statues are magical objects that display anomalous effects within battlefield biomes. They are only found inside the fortified towns you might rarely find within these areas.$(br2)They will spawn a new $(l:neutral_creatures/field_medic)field medic$() periodically until it has reached a sufficient threshold.

If you feel no remorse in destroying a town, using these statues may be beneficial in your own fortifications as the field medics will heal nearby minutemen, iron golems, and villagers.$(br)Remember not to damage them, or else they'll alert nearby minutemen and begin attacking you!
